text: Nangni diang arei kaom inkhatchu nangni ringkhuo omchan rakipkha Christa chongkahoi dungjuiya erase, kei'n nangni kanapha kaheiwa innum kaheiwa matormak innum, nangni ngai rakip in ratha khatbit ah kacheet ah ningngirra ningom, khat-um ngamna chongkahoi khan malung khatbit-ah ningdeisuomma ning om tihi kei'n kajet sik eii.
